title: Birmingham (England)
name: Old Joint Stock Theatre
content: Located in a beautifully located original 1864 building that was originally built as a bank, this intimate (only 95 seats) theatre hosts both guest performances as well as two resident companies, a Musical Theatre Group and a regular Theatre Group. It also serves as the main venue for the comedic Foghorn Improv. Downstairs is a pub located in the preserved Victorian bank hall with a glass dome and lavish decorations.
